thread.title: Iskra Lawrence oozes elegance at ELLE Style Awards | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Iskra Lawrence oozes elegance at ELLE Style Awards | Daily Mail Online

author: Kate Thomas For Mailonline
title: Iskra Lawrence oozes elegance at ELLE Style Awards | Daily Mail Online
text: FASHION DIRECTOR'S CHOICE Simon Jacquemus The star, who is a healthy size 14, is a strong advocate for self-empowerment and has been sharing her journey to accepting her curves on YouTube. She was joined by fellow model of the moment Arizona on the red carpet, who turned heads in a bright pink slip. Arizona - who recently got-engaged to her long-term partner - showcased her long, lithe physique in the floor-skimming dress. She kept her accessories to a minimum, sporting her hair in natural curls and emphasising her features with barely-there make-up, letting her statement dress do all the talking. Hosting duties: Nick Grimshaw was on fine form as he larked around behind the scenes Hell for leather: American Honey actress Sasha Lane dared to be different in a very unusual leather dress Cheeky: The cut-out sides offered a glimpse of sideboob as she posed for the cameras Fancy footwear: The rising star completed her attire with two-tone boots and patterned socks Fashion legend: Dame Vivienne Westwood was in attendance to celebrate all things stylish Legend: The 75-year-old fashion maven was quirky as ever in her vibrant ensemble Debbie Harry ruled the red carpet in a vibrant red suit and monochrome shirt, complete with quirky brogues. The Blondie icon posed with a giant crown, proving she was the undisputed queen of the red carpet - and fittingly took home the Style Icon gong on the night. Now in its 20th year, the ELLE Style Awards is the most highly anticipated fashion event of the season. Bringing together a unique mix of global fashion icons and world-renowned stars from both film and music, the awards celebrate new and emerging talent alongside fashion’s most talented achievers and cutting edge style luminaries. Strike a pose: Nick and model Eliza Cumming struck a pose behind the scenes at the awards Silver sensation: The British model made jaws drop in a floor-skimming lace number Hugging it out: The pair shared a warm embrace on the red carpet as the event kicked off Flower power: The Gossip singer was her usual fun and quirky self as she posed Mirror, mirror: Beth amused herself in the mirror lined hallway before entering the main bash Fun-loving: Beth added a pair of towering platform heels and a large silver chain to complete the look Catching up: British beauties Eliza Cummings and Sam Rollinson chatted Group shot: Iskra, Nick, Neelam, Maya and Stormzy caught up with one another once inside the venue Check him out: Henry Holland was posing with his fashion-forward friends Nick and Alice Sitting pretty: Arizona and Eric Underwood sat down to a gourmet dinner at the awards show The 20th ELLE Style Awards will be hosted by broadcaster Nick Grimshaw. Global Fashion brand H&M, will once again sponsor the ELLE Style Awards, recognising support for humanitarian and environmental causes through its H&M Conscious Award. Lotte Jeffs, Acting Editor, ELLE UK, commented: 'The ELLE Style Awards are the ultimate celebration of style and I am very excited to mark the event's landmark 20th anniversary this year. 'With a combination of incredible winners, presenters and guests, 2017 looks set to be the best year yet.' Dapper: Fashion designer Erdem Moralioglu (left) was suited and booted for the occasion, while Riz Ahmed (right) dared to be different in a patterned silk suit and shiny brogues Model looks: Damaris Goddrie dazzled in a glitzy black dress with two thigh-high splits, set off with simple heels Date night|: Stormzy and his girlfriend Maya Jama arrived in style together Grunge vibes: Alice Dellal teamed a colourful, motor print crop top with figure-hugging leather skirt Work it: The star, who completed her attire with a quirky braided hairstyle, worked her angles like a pro Jacqui Cave, Group Publishing Director, ELLE UK, says: 'The ELLE Style Awards is a headline event on the global fashion calendar which recognises the strength and diversity of talent within the industry. 'This year’s awards will be hosted in a glamorous new venue and will be filled with an array of top fashion influencers. 'We are also delighted to continue our partnership this year with our sponsor, H&M, which is globally renowned for its style-led designs.' Praised for her role as a pioneer and opinion leader in sustainable fashion, Orsola De Castro was awarded the H&M Conscious Award by sponsors H&M. Back to black: Model Sam Rollinson and Elle's Lotte Jeffs opted for black jumpsuits Elegant: The striking star wore her hair in a chic chignon and perfected her pout with a slick of deep red lipstick Prom princess: Ellie Bamber went all out in a voluminous tulle gown with bow detailing Check them out: Heloise Letissier (L) and Zawe Ashton (R) dared to be different in quirky checked ensembles Rainbow hued: Molly Goddard (left) and Izzy Bizu (right) wowed in bold and bright designs Here they come! The ladies exuded elegance as they made their grand arrival earlier in the evening Fairytale frock: Actress Ellie stunned in her tulle confection, with silver glitter matching her diamond jewellery Later on Gabriella Wilde seemed firmly a part of the Poldark family on Monday night, as she partied with leading lady Eleanor Tomlinson. Gorgeous actress Eleanor, known better as Demelza, and Gabriella, who recently took on the role Caroline Penvenen, reunited at the ELLE Style Awards afterparty, following an evening of A-list company at 41 Conduit Street in London. The model joined the cast in Poldark Series 2 as the 'beautiful and manipulative' niece of John Nettles' wealthy landowner Ray Penvenan, as well as the rest of the models as they partied up a storm following the awards. Party girls: Alice Dellal and Eliza looked like they were have a whale of a time Party time: Elsewhere, model Eliza Cummings let her hair down inside the venue Boogie: Sasha Lane (L) danced with Sink The Pink following the formal dinner as they let their hair down Glam trio: Naomi Shimada, Clara Amfo and Maya James posed for pictures at the after party Woman of the the year: Emma was spotted leaving the bash in an all-black ensemble following a night of festivities Taxi! The star cut a solitary figure as she headed home, all bundled up in her coat Calling it a night: Neelam, Arizona and Debbie (from left to right) followed suit as the night drew to a close Home time: Anya Taylor-Joy (left) and Neelam (right) were spotted hailing cabs after the bash Share or comment on this article 137
